name: Andres du Bouchet
bio:
An Emmy-nominated television writer, Andres is currently writing for and frequently appearing on Conan, TBS’ primetime talk show. He has also appeared on Bob’s Burgers, Brooklyn Nine-Nine, and Jonah Ray’s Hidden America. In addition, he frequently performs stand-up comedy in Los Angeles, where he currently resides. 

His unique characters, monologues, sketches, and absurdist style make him hard to miss, as do his loudness and size.

Follow Andres on Twitter: @dubouchet

Listen to Andres’ albums on iTunes.
